content: असमर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not able or competent. {@--2@} Weak, feeble. {@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Powerless to convey the intended meaning, a defect of a word; यत्तदर्थं पठ्यते न च तत्रास्य शाक्तिः तदसमर्थत्वं <ls>K. P. 7</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in कुंजं हंति कृशोदरी, हन्, though read in root-books in the sense of ‘going’, is here powerless to convey that meaning.
